name: Stay (itch) (David Wiesner)
description:
“Stay” is an experimental game I created as my BA thesis. In the game I explored how typography placed inside the world (opposed to having the text render as a form of UI element) would impact the gameplay, and how typography could be used to display the emotions of the speakers.

Controls

WASD + Mouse to navigate
shift to toggle running

Also playable with a controller.

Esc or right Menu Button toggles the options (they are only selectable via mouse).

Gameplay

Just follow Eline (the NPC character) through the forest and you should be fine.

Music

If you liked the music you can download it for free via bandcamp:

https://davidwiesner.bandcamp.com/album/stay
